name: POINT
description: Creates a geographic point from longitude and latitude coordinates.

examples.title: Use in distance calculation
examples.sql:
SELECT name, ST_DISTANCE(location, POINT(2.3522, 48.8566)) as distance_from_paris
FROM cities

examples.title: Insert geo point
examples.sql: INSERT INTO stores (name, location) VALUES ('Store A', POINT(-73.9857, 40.7484))

notes: Longitude is first, latitude is second (GeoJSON order)
